name: Zombie Apocalypse Mini Golf (VR)
detailed_description: The Zombie Apocalypse rages on, and after a long hard day of killing zombies and avoiding hostile humans, you need to blow off some steam. Which means grab your favorite chain-wrapped baseball bat, and putt-putt some zombie heads on your home-made post apocalyptic mini golf course! The destruction of the world as we know it doesn't mean we can't be civilized...
about_the_game: The Zombie Apocalypse rages on, and after a long hard day of killing zombies and avoiding hostile humans, you need to blow off some steam. Which means grab your favorite chain-wrapped baseball bat, and putt-putt some zombie heads on your home-made post apocalyptic mini golf course! The destruction of the world as we know it doesn't mean we can't be civilized...
short_description: Grab a baseball bat and a zombie head, and do some Virtual Reality putting in the destroyed aftermath of the apocalypse!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: 8th Generation i7 (or AMD equivalent)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: You're putting an undead decapitated zombie head all around the ruined aftermath of the apocalypse. There's lots of zombies lurking around in the dark, growling and moaning. There's lots of blood. Every time you hit the "ball" with your bloody baseball bat, gore squirts out everywhere, so by the time you're done putting on each course, it looks like rabid butchers had a chainsaw party. Enjoy :)
